Message:
Bathed in my medicine,
the foreboding bud’s petals
unfurled, a frail frame falling
from its once twisted maw.

Frantically reaching out
my arms to catch her,
the fallen girl weakly
smiled up at me.

“That won’t do.
If you miss even one spore,
I’ll have you start from scratch...

Over and over again.
As long as it takes!”

Why did you do
such a stupid thing?

I wanted to lecture her
on a million things,
but something else left my lips.

Nestled in my arms,
Meria grinned back at me.

“Awww, look who’s got
a cute side underneath
all that ice! Hehehe~”

Why do I like
someone like this...?
I shouldn’t have
saved her after all...
